General.Name: Bozhon Precision Industry Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: BOZHON Precision Industry Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the development, design, production, and sale of automation equipment, automated flexible production lines, automated key components, tooling, and others in China and internationally. The company is involved in industrial digitization, intelligent workshop integration equipment, production lines, three-dimensional warehouses and soft parts, industrial automation integrated equipment, tooling fixtures, new energy charging and discharging equipment, laser equipment, laser equipment peripheral products technology development, technical consultation, technical service, research and development, production, system integration, engineering installation, sales, and after-sales service. It provides digital chemical industry consulting services for solutions of factories, new energy vehicle products, mechanical and electronic equipment, industrial mobile trolleys, industrial mobile handling equipment, and related software. BOZHON Precision Industry Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2001 and is based in Suzhou, China.
General.Address: No.666 Huxin west Road, Suzhou, China, 215200
